content.text:
Select for the following pharmacokinetic phenomena <image 1> <image 2> <image 3>, the relevant optical representation. Transdermal absorption by active transport

A. Graph 1
B. Graph 2
C. Graph 3

C. Graph 3

Transdermal absorption by active transport typically results in a dose-dependent increase in the area under the curve (AUC) per dose, which is represented by Graph 3. This indicates that as the dose increases, the AUC also increases, reflecting the enhanced absorption of the drug through the skin.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
